name: Jill O' Lantern: First Slice
description:
It's a time-bending turnabout in this Ace Attorney meets Friday the 13th  adventure!  Join final girl Vivian Finala as she attempts to rewrite history and save her friends.  

But nothing is as it seems on Lake Shish Kabob.  Who is really friendly, and who is foe?  Who is really responsible for the murders?  And who is that cute cheerleader that keeps following Vivian around everywhere?

Get a free sample of a much bigger pie in Jill O' Lantern: First Slice!
